title: Wyze app update supports grouping lighting family products, account deletion, and more
content:
Wyze products are a solid choice for smart home fans. The company sells a wide variety of devices, including security cameras, locks, doorbells, and much more. A wise decision before investing in smart home products, though, would be checking if they’re actively supported. After all, security vulnerabilities surface all the time, and you would want

The post Wyze app update supports grouping lighting family products, account deletion, and more appeared first on XDA.
description: Wyze app update 2.31 for iOS and Android brings support for account deletion, grouping lighting family products, and much more.
